segments.text: It seems to me that everything is going digital nowadays .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Speaking of digital wares , I bought a digital camera last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A Sony . It's only one third the size of my old camera and looks rather smart .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Superb ! It's a 4 megapixel one and the photos it takes are very vivid and clear .
segments.speaker: S2
